Posts.Content: Hi everyone. I’m stage IV HER2+ PR & ER+ I was originally diagnosed Stage III in 2006 w/spread to stomach muscle lymph node and lung in 2016. I was on Herceptin and Perjeta and Femera but recently the only spot left in my lung grew just a little. My Onc wanted me to do SBRT radiation on it and continue my treatment they way it is,BUT my insurance apparently knows better. I am no longer certified for the treatment I’m on and the SBRT they consider experimental so they deem my treatment is now “no longer medically necessary “. I go to my Onc today to see what’s going to happen now. They said they would appeal, but what do I do in the meantime? I’m freaking out now. What treatments are next..? How does the insurance co know more than my doctor? Any advice would be greatly appreciated Thanks
Posts.Title: Insurance and progression
